title: His mom caught him spending time with his daddy. He lost daddy (SFC Benjamin Wise) in Afghanistan on...

object.content:
His mom caught him spending time with his daddy. He lost daddy (SFC Benjamin Wise) in Afghanistan on Jan 15th. And now he still finds time to spend with his loving father..

Our lives are short , and war can make them shorter, love those who serve make sure they know how you feel, do not be afraid to show your emotions, our life is a hard life and is so fulfilling at the same time. Because if that day comes you want to have so many good memories that they live on within you.. A man or Woman that serves now 1 of our fears is never to be able to tell you that we love you and you are our everything.. If we know we are loved we will never die alone..
He lost daddy (SFC Benjamin Wise) in Afghanistan on Jan 15th.2013 And now he still finds time to spend with his loving father.. Comrades and spouses Our lives are short , and war can make them shorter, love those who serve make sure they know how you feel, do not be afraid to show your emotions, our life is a hard life and is so fulfilling at the same time. Because if that day comes you want to have so many good memories that they live on within you..
My prayers are with you little man, your never alone you and your dad are  never forgotten, you are both loved by all, May your memories stay with you all your life and may your DAD live in your heart everyday.. He loves you never forget that little man..From David Lee 1974-1999 service both Army / Navy Retired.. I salute you little man I salute you

annotation: So beautiful, children they are  angels and so trusting n full of love n life ..He always have that pic in his heart
